segments.text: I stayed online chatting with friends all night . It was great fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't understand . You don't even know the ' friends ' you are ' talking ' to !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is better I don't know them . So I can say anything I want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you believe what they say ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who cares ? It's just online . It's not real . Do you want to join me tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , but I'm a lousy typist .
segments.speaker: S2
